name: Association of the European Self-Care Industry
membership:
AESGP represents its members in the Global Self-Care Federation (GSCF), which represents the views of the self-care industry globally and enjoys non-governmental status with the World Health Organization.
AESGP is in contact with all relevant organisations in its area of activity.
goal:
AESGP represents the manufacturers of non-prescription medicines, food supplements and self-care medical devices in Europe.
The mission of AESGP is to advance responsible self-care enabling citizens to take better care of their health needs and contribute to the sustainability of European health care systems.
The key objectives of AESGP are:
1. Promote the individual, societal and economic value and benefits of self-care.

2. Proactively shape the regulatory, legislative, political and economic framework where the consumer healthcare industry operates, with exceptional focus on non-prescription medicines, substance-based medical devices and food supplements.

3. Build greater trust in self-care and be recognised as a responsible industry.

4. Strengthen and develop a holistic network encompassing all relevant stakeholders and serve as a platform for Member AssociationsÂ¬.
